text: Axar Patel is an Indian cricketer who represents the national team in international cricket. He is a left-handed batsman and a slow left-arm orthodox bowler. Patel has gained recognition for his contributions in both Test and limited-overs formats of the game. He plays for Delhi Capitals team in Indian Premier League. == References == Category:Indian cricketers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Axar Patel
